DOC.brief_summary: A single-center , prospective , open-label feasibility study truSculpt radiofrequency device .
DOC.detailed_description: A single-center , prospective , open-label study evaluate safety efficacy Cutera truSculpt radiofrequency device optimal delivery thermal energy skin .
